On July 31st, the Jiangxi Government has issued a comprehensive policy requirement to people traveling from certain provinces:  1)Travelers entering from Zhengzhou after July 14th should be put in 14-days quarantine. They should have no less than 2 testings before the quarantine and conduct testing every other day during the quarantine.  2) Travelers entering from 6 places that have new cases after July 14th should make sure they fulfilled the 14-day stay-at-home observation and avoid attending mass gatherings and taking public transportation, do no less than 2 COVID testing. They should also report to local community of their traveling histories.  3) Suspension of entry from places of mid and high incidence and other measures from July 30th still apply.    https://web.archive.org/web/20210802151318/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/xtncUn_hPybjERFOgXIZMg

According to Health Commission of Shanxi Province, Those who have been in and out of Zhengzhou No. 6 People's Hospital since July 16 should report to their communities (villages) and units immediately and cooperate with the local authorities to implement nucleic acid testing, centralized medical observation and other epidemic prevention and control measures.  In addition, if not necessary, do not travel across provinces in the near future, especially do not travel to high-risk areas of the epidemic, the areas associated with the track of cases, and the tourist attractions where people gather. If you must go, you must keep personal protection for the whole journey, and report the situation to your community (village) and unit after you return, and cooperate with the implementation of local prevention and control measures.    See website: http://wjw.shanxi.gov.cn/wjywl02/29792.hrh  pdf archive available upon request.

As of 1 August 2021, three new COVID-19 cases have been confirmed in the Fangshan district of Beijing. The Fangshan government has conducted closed-off management on the communities where the confirmed cases live in Yanshan borough.     https://archive.ph/EbbOw

According to the 228th Beijing press briefing on the COVID-19 prevention and control, the level of control of entry into Beijing was upgraded. People from medium and high-risk areas were strictly controlled to enter Beijing. For areas with confirmed cases, flights, trains and buses to Beijing were suspended. The government is strengthening the control of entry channels into Beijing, strictly screening railroads, airlines and highway checkpoints. All levels of governments in Beijing should monitor people coming to Beijing for medical treatment and implement sound COVID-19 prevention measures.    https://archive.vn/CAf3s  https://archive.ph/EbbOw

According to the Beijing Municipal Health Commission, as of 1 August 2021, 19.07 million people have been vaccinated, among which 17.94 million people received a full course of COVID-19 vaccination. 96.98% of Beijing's resident population aged 18 and above has received at least one dose of vaccination, and the share of the population fully vaccinated is 92.14%.    https://archive.vn/Up0I2

In view of the current COVID-19 prevention and control situation, universities in Wuhan have enhanced preventions and controls for COVID-19:  (1) Wuhan University, Huazhong University of Science and Technology and other universities have made it clear that students should accumulate at least 14 days' health record before returning to school.   (2) Zhongnan University of Economics and Law has suspended all offline gathering activities on campus. Huazhong University of Science and Technology has suspended summer social practice.  (3) Universities in Wuhan has recommended that all faculty members should not leave the city unless necessary; students who stay at school should not go out unless necessary.  (4) Meetings in schools will be held online since then.   (5) Irrelevant people who do not belong to the faculty are not allowed to enter school.   See news website, archived: https://archive.vn/8naMb  Some middle schools and high schools have announced to restart online learning from August, see news website archived: https://archive.vn/FXLNr

On the afternoon of August 1, 2021, the provincial government held a video conference on the deployment of the province’s epidemic prevention and control work to re-emphasize and redeploy the current prevention and control work. The Ningbo municipal government has also imposed stricter requirements on the epidemic prevention policy for elderly services.  1. It is recommended that travel to the province, business trips and visits to relatives be suspended and those going out should report their itinerary. Strengthen the management of elderly people in the hospital and reduce outings when not necessary. Use appointments to check in older people returning (or newly admitted) to the hospital  2. Strictly control the admission visitation process, resume appointment visits and scheduled visits, strictly implement measures such as taking temperature, checking itineraries, flashing green codes, wearing masks and checking vaccination information, and register and remind those who have not been vaccinated. All visitors entering the country or from areas at risk of epidemic are temporarily not allowed to enter elderly service institutions. A moratorium on social admissions to conduct activities in the institutions.    https://web.archive.org/web/20210802155048/https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1706985605995544015&wfr=spider&for=pc

According to Health Commission of Shanxi Province, all offline large-scale conference activities adhere to the principle of "not to be held if it is not necessary, and whoever holds it will be responsible for it". If it is really necessary to hold it, it will be a combination of online and offline activities, with no more than 100 people offline. For those with more than 100 offline persons, they shall be approved by the competent authorities and reported to the office of the leading group for epidemic prevention and control in the territory for the record. The host (undertaking) unit shall work out the epidemic prevention and control implementation plan and strictly implement all measures for epidemic prevention and control.    See website: http://wjw.shanxi.gov.cn/gsggl08/29831.hrh  PDF archive available upon request

According to Health Commission of Shanxi Province, all cadres and staff of provincial organs, enterprises and public institutions should adhere to the principle of "not leaving the province unless necessary", and not to go to medium or high risk areas and areas related to cases track, if necessary, people should strictly follow the procedures of leave reporting and follow the requirements of "who applies, who approves, who is responsible".    Otherwise, those who have traveled or lived in areas with medium or high risk within 14 days, or have been in or out of Zhengzhou Sixth People's Hospital since July 16 should immediately report to their communities (villages) and units, and actively cooperate with their localities to implement epidemic prevention and control measures such as nucleic acid testing and quarantine medical observation.    What‘s more, people returning from high-risk areas within 14 days will be put under "14+2" centralized quarantine. People returning to Shanxi from medium-risk areas will be quarantined at home under the "14+2" policy. Those who do not have the conditions for home quarantine will be quarantined at centralized centers. "7+2" home health monitoring was carried out for those returning from other low-risk areas in the cities where the medium-high risk areas are located.      See website: http://wjw.shanxi.gov.cn/gsggl08/29831.hrh  PDF archive available upon request

According to the People's Government of Shanxi Province, regular epidemic prevention and control measures should be implemented in airports, stations, medical institutions, public transport, parks, scenic spots, amusement venues, shopping malls, supermarkets, markets, catering and accommodation areas and other crowded places, and masks should be strictly worn at all times.    See website: http://www.shanxi.gov.cn/yw/xwfbh/szfxwfbh/202108/t20210803_930819.shtml  PDF archive available upon request

According to the People's Government of Shanxi Province, at present, the vaccine coverage rate of the population over 18 years old has reached 86.3%, and the vaccination work of the population aged 15-17 years has been started since August, and the vaccination coverage rate of the population over 12 years old should reach at least 91.2% before the end of October, in order to form the immune barrier of the population as soon as possible    See website: http://www.shanxi.gov.cn/yw/xwfbh/szfxwfbh/202108/t20210803_930819.shtml  PDF archive available upon request

According to the announcement put by Tianjin Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism on Aug.3rd, parks and scenic areas should limit the visitor flow to 75% of their capacity. Moreover, they need to check visitors’ health QR code and vaccination code. For those who have no vaccination code, registration is required. On August 4, 2021, after the teleconference of the State Council's joint prevention and control mechanism on epidemic prevention and control, Jilin Provincial Party Secretary Jing Junhai immediately presided over a video dispatch meeting on the province's epidemic prevention and control work, quickly implemented the requirements of the CPC Central Committee and the State Council, and then arranged for the re-deployment of jilin Province's epidemic prevention and control work. Local governments at all levels have also introduced corresponding measures, singing and dancing entertainment, Internet services, chess rooms and other indoor amusement venues, as well as massage, beauty and other closed places suspended business. Xiamen City Headquarters for Response to the COVID-19 in Fujian province launched Announcement No. 3 [2021] on 6 August, which mandated all chess and card rooms and mahjong halls in the city are temporarily closed, and the   reception volume of many public places like parks, Internet cafes, gymnasiums, swimming pools, gyms,religious sites, libraries shall not exceed 75% of the maximum carrying capacity. Appointment, peak shifting, current limiting, etc. should be used to reduce the gathering of people.  https://web.archive.org/web/20210808162052/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/ZEhwT_j2R8uQINQ1q85GUA  Pingtan Comprehensive Experimental Zone Response Headquarters for COVID-19 in Fujian also commanded all tourist attractions, scenic spots, open parks, amusement parks, indoor enclosed entertainment venues, cinemas, religious places, etc. strictly implement the requirements of "limited, appointment, and peak shifting", and control the upper limit of tourist reception, not exceeding 75% of the maximum carrying capacity. And in accordance with the principle of "non-essential and non-organized", the entire district controls the frequency and scale of meetings, reduces gatherings, weddings, funerals, and wedding activities should be simplified, and various large-scale events are not held if they are not necessary. Reduce or cancel public gathering activities, try to change to online activities, video conferences, etc., and try to reduce the scale and control the number of people. If the number of participants is more than 50, a complete prevention and control plan shall be formulated.  https://web.archive.org/web/20210808163025/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/5C1urCwQgmRLsL_ALBlTkw

Those who cannot provide a negative nucleic acid test within 48 hours, those whose health code is not green, those whose travel card shows a 14-day travel history in high-risk areas, and those who have abnormal temperature tests and symptoms such as fatigue, runny nose and dry cough are not allowed to enter Beijing. On 13/08/2021, five neighbourhoods in Haidian District's Ganjiakou Subdistrict were officially lifted from enclosed management.  These neighbourhoods are still strictly enforcing preventive measures. On 13/08/2021, five neighbourhoods in Haidian District's Ganjiakou Subdistrict were officially lifted from enclosed management.  These neighbourhoods are still strictly enforcing preventive measures, including 24-hour guarding at the entrances and exits of each neighbourhood, all residents in the areas entering and exiting with ID passes. They also implement temperature measurement, ID checking, health-kit scanning and registration of outsiders. According to experts' advice, these neighbourhoods are all required to carry out 7-day health monitoring.    https://archive.vn/WCZeO

On Aug 13th, in response to new cases rise in Hubei and Henan, the Jiangxi Government issued a comprehensive policy requirement to people traveling from certain provinces:  1)Travelers entering from high incidence places after July 28th should be put in 14-days quarantine. They should have no less than 2 testings before the quarantine and conduct testing every other day during the quarantine.  2) Travelers entering from middle incidence places between July 27th should make sure they fulfilled the 14-day stay-at-home observation and avoid attending mass gatherings and taking public transportation, do no less than 2 COVID testing .    https://web.archive.org/web/20210816095733/https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/GoHYg8_D35_9v8lMLugbdg

People from the counties or districts with the medium and high-risk areas and those with a history of residence in these areas within 14 days are temporarily not allowed to enter Beijing. On September 3, 2021, Guizhou Province stipulated that the control measures of "14-day centralized isolation and 14-day home health monitoring and 7 nucleic acid testing" should be strictly implemented for personnel from high-risk areas outside and outside the province. For those who come (return) to the risk areas outside the province, they shall hold the local outbreak prevention and control command (leadership group) approval certificate and the negative certificate of nucleic acid testing within 48 hours, and detect 1 nucleic acid at the first station in the province, the results do not flow before it is out; Other low-risk areas in the cities where the medium and high-risk areas are located must hold a negative certificate of nucleic acid testing within 48 hours, or test for nucleic acids once at the first station, and do not flow until the results are available. The rest of the low-risk areas to (return) the personnel in the temperature-scanning code is not abnormal and do a good job of personal protection under the premise of orderly flow. Elderly people, children and staff in the hospital may go out and report their route upon return; friends, relatives, volunteers and others may also be admitted to visit the hospital after a real name is registered to measure the temperature and light up the code, and in principle wear a mask throughout the visit. There is no restriction on the number of visitors or the number of visits to elderly and children's welfare institutions, which are determined by the institutions themselves according to the conditions of their facilities and their ability to provide services. Accelerate the resumption of normal operations of township (street) home care service centres, community home care centres and elderly canteens, and do not use epidemic prevention and control as an excuse to stop services.  https://web.archive.org/web/20210906041120/https://www.sohu.com/a/487688431_121123527

Add a piece of information applicable to Qinghai since August: With the severity of the epidemic in Nanjing, Qinghai Province has increased risk prevention and control in public places, emphasizing that it is unnecessary not to travel far and not to go to medium and high-risk areas. In order to effectively prevent and control the epidemic situation, the team of Qinghaihu erlangjian scenic spot and self-help tourists all implement the online reservation and ticket purchase system. Tourists with a history of residence in the county (city, district) where the epidemic occurred shall provide a negative nucleic acid test report within 48 hours, and the tourist reception shall not exceed 70% of the maximum carrying capacity. Qinghai Province completed the first dose of vaccination for people aged 15-17, 12-14 and over 18 respectively on August 23, August 28 and August 30. It is the 12th Province in China to fully complete the first dose of vaccination. It will spare no effort to complete the second dose of vaccination for target people aged 12 and over on time. Strictly monitor the health status of personnel in and out. According to the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Culture and Tourism, Beijing will allow travel agencies and online travel companies to resume inter-provincial group Tours and "air tickets plus hotels" from Sept 10. However, travel agencies and online tourism enterprises shall not organize or receive persons with abnormal health codes, unknown itinerary, travel history in prefecture-level cities with one or more new local novel coronavirus infection cases within 14 days, and persons who have been at risk of COVID-19 for less than 21 days in China. Group Tours and "air ticket + hotel" services shall not be carried out in prefecture-level cities where one or more new novel Coronavirus cases have been reported in Beijing within 14 days. In addition, tourist groups to Beijing should strictly comply with the epidemic prevention requirements. They must have been vaccinated with novel Coronavirus vaccine for at least 14 days before entering Beijing. Travel agencies should urge authorized travel agencies to ensure that all members of the verification team must meet the requirements of "Beijing Healthbao" green code and have been fully vaccinated with novel Coronavirus vaccine for at least 14 days before the group sets off for Beijing, and fill in the electronic itinerary of the travel team timely and accurately. In receiving persons who have signed up for group Tours in Beijing for a short period of time, travel agencies shall also verify that they meet the requirements of having received the novel Coronavirus vaccine for at least 14 days.    See Website:https://archive.vn/dtZ4J

According to public information(see  https://web.archive.org/web/20210921132510/https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1710740287992469215&wfr=spider&for=pc), during the period of full-residents testing,except for supermarkets, farmer's markets, hospitals, and pharmacies, all other business premises were required to close in Xianyou county. All the closed, controlled, and precautionary zones in Quangang District will be lifted. All passenger cars since 0:00 on October 1, 2021, rural buses and bus lines in the main urban area resume operations.  Chess and card rooms, cinemas, Internet cafes, karaoke halls, bars, billiards halls, museums, libraries, fitness venues, training institutions, religious venues and other related indoor public places are opened in order.  https://web.archive.org/web/20211006133557/https://baijiahao.baidu.com/s?id=1712430478068105882&wfr=spider&for=pc

Governments issued a series of epidemic prevention and control policies during National Day.
